name: Civil War (itch)
description:
Civil War

Civil war is a medieval adventure game in third person.

Travel through Asaral in 6 chapters.

And two different endings.

Argument

Asaral has been submerged in a civil war for 25 years.

25 years ago Asaral was being invaded by a neighboring country, the invasion started from the south to the center, these territories were under enemy control for many years, however, after several years and many battles Asaral managed to expel the invaders.

Shortly after an assembly was made where it was proposed that the king had absolute power, however, much of the south opposed this proposal, creating a conflict of ideas between the north and south, starting the civil war.
